summary: A probing look into the potential future of "thought policing" through the headline-making case of the NYPD "Cannibal Cop," who was charged with conspiring to kidnap and eat women.
cast: Gary Allen|Violet Blue|James A. Cohen|Joseph DeMarco|Alan Dershowitz|Daniel Engber|David Greenfield|Dareh Gregorian|Robert Kolker|Chris Kraft|Erin Murphy|Laurie Penny|Christina Rodriguez|Jane Rosenberg|Lee Rowland|Maria Tatar|Gilberto Valle|Michael Welner
title: Crímenes del pensamiento: el caso del policía caníbal
